reviews.review: I saw it and it was a mishmash of too many stories and characters. I'm honestly very disappointed. I know the comics, but I still am trying to parce out the movie. The motives of Thanos were too monolithic and simplistic. Very James Bond villain type of thinking. Very one dimensional and making very little sense.

Action packed. Good comedy. Good length. There are missing characters who could have made a big difference in how the movie turned out. This is what I expected would happen in the movie. I would have liked to have been surprised thats why only 4 stars. And Marvel needs more blood and guts. Also, when people die they need to stay dead. Dont screw with me.

[SPOILER ALERT] Really good but i hated the cliff hanger so damn much and some plots didn't really click but overall a really good movie the death of spiderman really had a impact on tony and buckys death on steve it was just pretty emotional some character deaths were just predictable and didn't really pack a punch

Not a perfect film, but a perfectly balanced masterpiece mechanism. Each line, every scene, like a gear, takes its place in this mechanism. Stupid characters make critical mistakes, smart characters play long-playing plans, all atypical decisions of the characters have justifications that are imperceptible at first glance, and all the plot holes are filled with an existing MCU plot base. Unlike all previous Avengers movies, watching this movie doesn't make sense without knowing the previous franchise films, but this is its uniqueness.
What work has been done in these 10 years and how harmoniously it is connected in its pre-climax is worthy of respect.
The movie was good until the end where they killed off HALF of the superhero's which made a toddler in the theater cry. Great job Marvel, making little kids cry.
the movie was amazing, I would see it again and again.

The movie was great the pace of the movie was great there where funny moments and sad also the action and fighting scenes where great the villain was great the cinematography was great overall great movie
